queryMap:
SPARQL '''PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>

SELECT ?item WHERE { ?item (wdt:P31/wdt:P279*) wd:Q7397.} LIMIT 10'''@START

SPARQL '''PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>

SELECT ?item WHERE { ?item (wdt:P31/wdt:P279*) wd:Q7397.} LIMIT 100'''@START

dataLabel: Get all software items from Wikidata
queryMap:
SPARQL '''PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>

SELECT ?item WHERE { ?item (wdt:P31/wdt:P279*) wd:Q7397.}'''@START
